Articles.Content:
Okay I have a real problem now, whenever I open my landing gear the ranger just flips completely out of control. At first I thought it was because of my planet pack but I tried it on kerbin and in space and it has the same effects, please help!

Edited November 20, 2023 by whytho
Is this mod discontinued? Because the ranger hasn't been bug-fixed for some time, its aerodynamics are terrible in the lower atmosphere and the lander gear breaks the game.

Sadly, it probably is, as Interstellar came out almost a decade ago.

Sad as I love that movie and have watched it at least 20 times. Suddenly I feel very old.
I would like to ask why my Ranger keeps reporting Tokamak reactor zero efficiency, becouse I'm on Eve and i have full container with fusion pellets.
Where is the ring for the endurance mod v1.13???
